Regulation Name(s): Instrumentation for clinical multiplex test systems
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): Applied Biosystems 7500 Fast Dx Real-Time PCR Instrument
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Applied Biosystems 7500 Fast Dx Real-Time PCR instrument for nucleic acid amplification and detection.
Indications for Use Summary: Real-time nucleic acid amplification and detection system for measuring nucleic acid signals from reverse transcribed RNA using fluorescent hydrolysis probes, for use by trained laboratory technologists.
